mapper.select: select * from eahttpsession where 1=1 and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID}
mapper.delete: delete eahttpsession where 1=1 and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID} and SESSIONID= #{SESSIONID}
